channel.title: swarm mode on Kunal Kushwaha
channel.description: Recent content in swarm mode on Kunal Kushwaha

item.title: docker 1.12RC demo
item.description: Last friday (22nd July), I gave DockerCon16 Recap Talk and demo at Docker Meetup Tokyo This blog post gives a walk through my Docker Meetup demonstration, and you can follow these steps to try at your machines. In DockerCon16, docker 1.12 RC was announced. This release has an important & interesting feature called docker swarm mode Get Docker 1.12 RC. If you are using Docker for Mac or Docker for Windows, You already have docker 1.
